溦字的基本解释

溦
wēi
小雨。

溦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méi］
［《集韻》旻悲切，平脂，明。］
亦作“霺1”。
(1)通“霉”。指物体受潮湿而变质。
(2)通“湄”。岸边，水与草交接的地方。

溦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溦； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页640第14
【唐韻】【集韻】?無非切，音微。【說文】小雨也。【集韻】或作㵟霺。　又【類篇】旻悲切，音眉。谷與瀆通也。【爾雅·釋丘】窮瀆氾谷者溦。

溦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
溦字的起名意思

：指小雨。

Basic explanation of words
Luo
wēi
Light rain.
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méi］
["Ji Yun" Min sad, Pingzhi, Ming. ]
Also known as "霺1".
(1) Through "mold". Refers to the deterioration of objects due to moisture.
(2) Through "Mee". On the shore, where the water meets the grass.

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　溦; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 640 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's nothing more than cut, the sound is micro. [Said the text] Xiao Yu also. 【Ji Yun】or as 㵟霺.　[Classes] Min sad, sound eyebrows. Valley and Du are also connected. 【Erya·Shuqiu】The people who stray from the pangu.
